Description:
AI agents are reshaping business operations across sectors. If youâ€™re looking to bolster your business with agents, this session offers a strategic approach for building intelligent agents that truly understand your data. Learn how to uncover next-level AI reasoning for your agents using knowledge graphs, vector search and the latest AI integrations directly in PostgreSQL on Azure. Leave with a blueprint and best practices from Azure customers you can use to augment your own apps and copilots.

BRK130 | English (US) | Migrate and modernize your estate, Azure Database for PostgreSQL Breakout | Advanced (300) #MSIgnite, #Unifyyourdataplatform

Chapters: 0:00 - Horizon DB architecture: separation of compute and storage layers for performance and availability 00:07:38 - AI Model Management feature: streamlined provisioning, lifecycle control, and integrated billing 00:14:22 - Automatically provisioned AI models (GPT-5, text embeddings, semantic ranking) 00:15:02 - Using Generate operator to summarize product reviews inside SQL 00:15:27 - Using Extract operator to identify toy universes and build knowledge graphs 00:23:01 - Introduction to Microsoft Foundry Integration with AI and Databases 00:25:02 - Step-by-Step Setup Using AZD Up Command for Postgres Connection 00:29:00 - Live Demo: Metrics Intelligence and GitHub Copilot Fixing Database Performance 00:36:19 - Automated Protocol Amendment Management and Intelligent Revision Tracking
Author: Microsoft Events
Title: The blueprint for intelligent AI agents backed by PostgreSQL | BRK130
